name: Space Explorer (Fixed)
description:
Created All Assets but used music from: https://opengameart.org/content/deep-space-flight

Game Created For LM0B Beginners Game Jam #25

Not Finished but wanted to submit it and didn't have enough time.

The key feature of shooting is missing in the game so have fun ramming the enemy ships.

Also, the game is currently missing anything to do on the moon, such as sleeping to reset day and buying upgrades.

Left Arrow - Rotate Left. Right Arrow. Rotate Right. Space - Boost.
